oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ring given to Portia Davis Gause by Mr. Green, a Confederate soldier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portia Davis Gause described this ring in an accompanying note (wils017). A Mr. Green gave it to her before the war. He was either killed during the war, or died of disease, and never came home. It bears the inscription "Remember the giver" on the inside.; See wils017
